startMessage:
Hello, I'm *Janna*! 

_I'm a bot that sends you the weather forecast data for your city._ 😄!

*Climatolgiabot - Official Channel📬:* [Click here](https://t.me/climatologiaofc)
help_message:
Hello! I'm a *weather bot.* 

You can use me inline, this means you don't need to add me to groups, just type my username and city name. test and send the weather forecast in your city... 

For example: `@climatologiabot New York`
Use the bot to share the weather in your city.
chooseLanguage: Select the language you want to use in the bot
langChangedMessage: Your language has been set to English 🇺🇸
chooseLangMessage: Select the language you want to use in the bot:
weather_forecast_message:
*Weather forecast for your city {{emoji}} * 

*🌡️ Temperature:* {{temperature}}°F
*🌤️ Description:* {{weatherDescription}} 
🏖 * Thermal sensation:* {{feelsLike}}°F
💨 *Wind speed:* {{windSpeed}} mph 
💦 *Relative air humidity:* {{humidity}}% 
*🌎 Country: * {{countryCode}} 

*🔍 Retrieved at:* {{horarioFormatado}} (UTC−3)
description_hidden:
See weather for {{cityName}} - {{countryCode}} 
Note: CITY NAME HIDDEN
description_visible:
See weather for {{cityName}} - {{countryCode}} 
Note: VISIBLE CITY NAME
erro_message: Unable to get weather forecast. Please try again later.
pv_message_lang: ⚙️ Please click the button below to change the language in a private chat.
